title: Delhi to Jaipur Road Trip
summary: A wonderful 3-day journey exploring Rajasthan's pink city, starting from the capital Delhi. Experience the rich culture, magnificent forts, and delicious cuisine.

activities.title: Visit Amber Fort
activities.description: Explore the magnificent Amber Fort with its stunning architecture and panoramic views of the city

activities.title: Lunch at Chokhi Dhani
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Rajasthani thali at this ethnic village resort

activities.title: Hawa Mahal Visit
activities.description: Visit the iconic Palace of Winds, known for its unique honeycomb structure

activities.title: City Palace Tour
activities.description: Explore the royal residence and museum showcasing Jaipur's rich history

activities.title: Shopping at Johari Bazaar
activities.description: Pick up traditional jewelry, textiles, and souvenirs

activities.title: Departure
activities.description: Head back to Delhi with wonderful memories
